timeline.bodyText: The delete api seems a bit dangerous. Should we protect it to only allow deleting certain paths? Seems this api will allow deleting the entire cluster?
timeline.author: mayankshriv

timeline.bodyText: Will this allow any arbitrary path to be set with any arbitrary value (as-in possibly corrupt the cluster state)?
timeline.author: mayankshriv

replies.bodyText: yes. ZK does allow that. However, the UI will only allow updating the leaf node.
